snippet: Stocks recovered most of this week’s losses, as Greece moved closer to unlocking aid needed to avoid a default.
abstract: Stocks recover most of the week’s losses, as Greece moves closer to unlocking aid needed to avoid a default.
lead_paragraph: Stocks recovered most of this week’s losses, as Greece moved closer to unlocking aid needed to avoid a default.

headline.main: Shares Rise on Hope Of Greek Bond Swap
